text: Grzegorz Krejner (born 25 February 1969) is a Polish former cyclist. He competed at four Olympic Games, including Barcelona 1992, Atlanta 1996, Sydney 2000, and Athens 2004. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Poland Category:Cyclists at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:People from Żyrardów Category:Sportspeople from Masovian Voivodeship
title: Grzegorz Krejner
